page.title: 17 Westinghouse Factory 2.
page.content: The second largest part of Westinghouse is the part that makes {Brakes.}These are fitted to all sorts of trains, mainly abroad, and the company works as a subcontractor to other manufacturers. Another part makes{Semi-Conductors, which are silicon chips used for power control, mainly in electric trains. They are manufactured in a place called a "clean room" where the atmosphere has to be kept very pure as the silicon chips are cut up. The smallest division of Westinghouse makes{Rectifiers.}Here they make static power supply equipment for Alternating Current and Direct Current. Originally this was just for railways but now they are used elsewhere too.
